title: Kim Jong-hyeok
text:
Kim Jong-hyeok (born 31 March 1983) is a South Korean <a href="Association%20football">football</a> <a href="Referee%20%28association%20football%29">referee</a> who has been a full international referee for <a href="FIFA">FIFA</a>.
Kim became a FIFA referee in 2009. He also refereed in <a href="2014%20FIFA%20World%20Cup%20qualification%20%28AFC%29">2014 FIFA World Cup qualifiers</a>, beginning with the opening-round match between <a href="Mongolia%20national%20football%20team">Mongolia</a> and <a href="Myanmar%20national%20football%20team">Myanmar</a>.
